1:
Blessed are those whose ways are blameless,
\q who walk in the law of Yahweh.
\q
2:
Blessed are they who keep his solemn commands,
\q who seek him with all their heart.
4:
You have commanded us to keep your instructions
\q so that we should carefully observe them.
5:
Oh, that I would be firmly established
\q in the observance of your statutes!
\q
6:
Then I would not be put to shame
\q when I think of all your commandments.
7:
I will give thanks to you with an upright heart
\q when I learn your righteous decrees.
\q
8:
I will observe your statutes;
\q do not leave me alone.
9:
How can a young person keep his path pure?
\q By obeying your word.
\q
10:
With my whole heart I seek you;
\q Do not let me stray from your commandments.
11:
I have stored up your word in my heart
\q so that I might not sin against you.
\q
12:
Blessed you are, Yahweh;
\q teach me your statutes.
13:
With my mouth I have declared
\q all the righteous decrees that you have revealed.
\q
14:
I rejoice in the way of your covenant decrees
\q more than in all riches.
15:
I will meditate on your instructions
\q and pay attention to your ways.
\q
16:
I delight in your statutes;
\q I will not forget your word.
17:
Be kind to your servant so that I may live
\q and keep your word.
\q
18:
Open my eyes so that I may see
\q marvelous things in your law.
20:
My desires are crushed by the longing to know
\q your righteous decrees at all times.
21:
You rebuke the proud, who are cursed,
\q who wander from your commandments.
\q
22:
Spare me from disgrace and humiliation,
\q for I have obeyed your covenant decrees.
23:
Though rulers plot and slander me,
\q your servant meditates on your statutes.
\q
24:
Your covenant decrees are my delight,
\q and they are my counselors.
25:
My life clings to the dust!
\q Give me life by your word.
\q
26:
I told you my ways, and you answered me;
\q teach me your statutes.
27:
Make me understand the ways of your instructions,
\q so that I can meditate on your wondrous teachings.
\q
28:
I am overwhelmed with grief!
\q Strengthen me by your word.
30:
I have chosen the way of faithfulness;
\q I have always kept your righteous decrees before me.
32:
I will run in the path of your commandments,
\q for you enlarge my heart to do so.
33:
Teach me, Yahweh, the way of your statutes,
\q and I will keep them to the end.
\q
34:
Give me understanding, and I will keep your law;
\q I will observe it with all my heart.
35:
Guide me in the path of your commandments,
\q for I delight to walk in it.
\q
36:
Direct my heart toward your covenant decrees
\q and away from unrighteous gain.
38:
Carry out for your servant your promise
\q that you made to those who honor you.
39:
Take away the insults I dread,
\q for your righteous judgments are good.
\q
40:
See, I have longed for your instructions;
\q revive me in your righteousness.
42:
then I will have a reply for the one who mocks me,
\q for I trust in your word.
43:
Do not take the word of truth from my mouth,
\q for I have waited for your righteous decrees.
\q
44:
I will observe your law continually,
\q forever and ever.
45:
I will walk securely,
\q for I seek your instructions.
\q
46:
I will speak of your solemn commands before kings
\q and will not be ashamed.
47:
I delight in your commandments,
\q which I love dearly.
\q
48:
I will lift up my hands to your commandments, which I love;
\q I will meditate on your statutes.
49:
Call to mind your promise to your servant
\q because you have given me hope.
\q
50:
This is my comfort in my affliction:
\q that your promise has kept me alive.
51:
The proud have scoffed at me,
\q yet I have not turned away from your law.
\q
52:
I have thought about your righteous decrees from ancient times, Yahweh,
\q and I comfort myself.
53:
Hot anger has taken hold of me
\q because of the wicked who reject your law.
\q
54:
Your statutes have been my songs
\q in the house where I temporarily live.
55:
I think about your name during the night, Yahweh,
\q and I keep your law.
\q
56:
This has been my practice
\q because I have observed your instructions.
58:
I earnestly request your favor with my whole heart;
\q be merciful to me, as your word promised.
59:
I examined my ways
\q and turned my feet to your covenant decrees.
\q
60:
I hurry and do not delay
\q to keep your commandments.
62:
At midnight I rise to give thanks to you
\q because of your righteous decrees.
63:
I am a companion of all who honor you,
\q to all who observe your instructions.
\q
64:
The earth, Yahweh, is full of your covenant faithfulness;
\q teach me your statutes.
65:
You have done good to your servant,
\q Yahweh, by means of your word.
\q
66:
Teach me proper discernment and understanding,
\q for I have believed in your commandments.
67:
Before I was afflicted I went astray,
\q but now I observe your word.
\q
68:
You are good, and you are one who does good;
\q teach me your statutes.
69:
The arrogant have smeared me with lies,
\q but I keep your instructions with my whole heart.
\q
70:
Their hearts are hardened,
\q but I delight in your law.
71:
It is good for me that I have suffered
\q so that I would learn your statutes.
\q
72:
Instruction from your mouth is more precious to me
\q than thousands of pieces of gold and silver.
74:
Those who honor you will be glad when they see me
\q because I find hope in your word.
75:
I know, Yahweh, that your decrees are just,
\q and that in faithfulness you afflicted me.
\q
76:
Let your covenant faithfulness comfort me,
\q as you promised your servant.
77:
Show me compassion so that I may live,
\q for your law is my delight.
\q
79:
May those who honor you turn to me,
\q those who know your covenant decrees.
\q
80:
May my heart be blameless with respect to your statutes
\q so that I may not be put to shame.
81:
I faint with longing that you might rescue me!
\q I have hope in your word.
\q
82:
My eyes long to see your promise;
\q when will you comfort me?
84:
How long must your servant endure this;
\q when will you judge those who persecute me?
85:
The proud have dug pits for me,
\q defying your law.
\q
86:
All your commandments are reliable;
\q those people persecute me wrongfully; help me.
87:
They have almost made an end to me on earth,
\q but I do not reject your instructions.
\q
88:
By your steadfast love, keep me alive,
\q so that I may obey your commands.
90:
Your faithfulness lasts for all generations;
\q you have established the earth, and it remains.
91:
All things continue to this day, just as you said in your righteous decrees,
\q for all things are your servants.
\q
92:
If your law had not been my delight,
\q I would have perished in my affliction.
93:
I will never forget your instructions,
\q for through them you have kept me alive.
\q
94:
I am yours; save me,
\q for I seek your instructions.
95:
The wicked prepare to destroy me,
\q but I will seek to understand your covenant decrees.
\q
96:
I have seen that everything has its limits,
\q but your commandments are broad, beyond limits.
97:
Oh how I love your law!
\q It is my meditation all day long.
\q
98:
Your commandments make me wiser than my enemies,
\q for your commandments are always with me.
99:
I have more understanding than all my teachers,
\q for I meditate on your covenant decrees.
\q
100:
I understand more than those older than I am;
\q this is because I have kept your instructions.
101:
I have kept my feet back from every evil path
\q so that I might observe your word.
\q
102:
I have not turned aside from your righteous decrees,
\q for you have instructed me.
103:
How sweet are your words to my taste,
\q yes, sweeter than honey to my mouth!
\q
104:
Through your instructions I gain discernment;
\q therefore I hate every false way.
105:
Your word is a lamp to my feet
\q and a light for my path.


\q
106:
I have sworn and have confirmed it,
\q that I will observe your righteous decrees.
108:
Yahweh, please accept the freewill offerings of my mouth,
\q and teach me your righteous decrees.
109:
My life is always in my hand,
\q yet I do not forget your law.
\q
110:
The wicked have set a snare for me,
\q but I have not strayed from your instructions.
111:
I claim your covenant decrees as my heritage forever,
\q for they are the joy of my heart.
\q
112:
My heart is set on obeying your statutes
\q forever to the very end.
113:
I hate those who have a double mind,
\q but I love your law.
\q
114:
You are my hiding place and my shield;
\q I wait for your word.
115:
Get away from me, you evil doers,
\q so that I may observe the commandments of my God.
\q
116:
Sustain me by your word so that I may live
\q and not be ashamed of my hope.
118:
You reject all those who stray from your statutes,
\q for those people are deceptive and unreliable.
120:
My body trembles in fear of you,
\q and I am afraid of your righteous decrees.
122:
Guarantee the welfare of your servant;
\q do not let the proud oppress me.
123:
My eyes grow tired as I wait for your salvation
\q and for your righteous word.
\q
124:
Show your servant your covenant faithfulness,
\q and teach me your statutes.
125:
I am your servant; give me understanding
\q so that I may know your covenant decrees.
\q
126:
It is time for Yahweh to act,
\q for people have broken your law.
127:
Truly I love your commandments
\q more than gold, more than fine gold.
\q
128:
Therefore I carefully follow all your instructions,
\q and I hate every path of falsehood.
129:
Your rules are wonderful,
\q that is why I obey them.
\q
130:
The unfolding of your words gives light;
\q it gives understanding to the untrained.
131:
I open my mouth and pant,
\q for I long for your commandments.
\q
132:
Turn to me and have mercy on me,
\q as you always do for those who love your name.
134:
Redeem me from human oppression
\q so that I may observe your instructions.
135:
Let your face shine on your servant,
\q and teach me your statutes.
\q
136:
Streams of tears run down from my eyes
\q because people do not observe your law.
137:
You are righteous, Yahweh,
\q and your decrees are fair.
\q
138:
You have given your covenant decrees righteously
\q and faithfully.
139:
Anger has destroyed me
\q because my adversaries forget your words.
\q
140:
Your word has been tested very much,
\q and your servant loves it.
141:
I am insignificant and despised,
\q yet I do not forget your instructions.
\q
142:
Your justice is forever right,
\q and your law is trustworthy.
143:
Though distress and anguish have found me,
\q your commandments are still my delight.
\q
144:
Your covenant decrees are righteous forever;
\q give me understanding that I may live.
145:
I cried out with my whole heart, "Answer me, Yahweh,
\q I will keep your statutes.
\q
146:
I call to you; save me,
\q and I will observe your covenant decrees."
147:
I rise before the dawn of the morning and cry for help.
\q I hope in your words.
\q
148:
My eyes are open before the night watches change
\q so that I might meditate on your word.
150:
Those who are persecuting me are coming closer to me,
\q but they are far from your law.
151:
You are near, Yahweh,
\q and all your commandments are trustworthy.
\q
152:
Long ago I learned from your covenant decrees
\q that you had set them in place forever.
153:
Look on my affliction and help me,
\q for I do not forget your law.
\q
154:
Plead my cause and redeem me;
\q keep me, as you have promised in your word.
155:
Salvation is far from the wicked,
\q for they do not love your statutes.
\q
156:
Great are your merciful actions, Yahweh;
\q keep me alive, as you always do.
157:
My persecutors and my foes are many,
\q yet I have not turned from your covenant decrees.
\q
158:
I view the treacherous with disgust
\q because they do not keep your word.
160:
The essence of your word is truth;
\q every one of your righteous decrees lasts forever.
162:
I rejoice at your word
\q like one who finds great plunder.
163:
I hate and despise falsehood,
\q but I love your law.
\q
164:
Seven times a day I praise you
\q because of your righteous decrees.
166:
I wait for your salvation, Yahweh,
\q and I obey your commandments.
167:
I observe your solemn commands,
\q and I love them greatly.
\q
168:
I keep your instructions and your solemn commands,
\q for you are aware of everything I do.
170:
May my plea come before you;
\q help me, as you have promised in your word.
171:
May my lips pour out praise,
\q for you teach me your statutes.
\q
172:
Let my tongue sing about your word,
\q for all your commandments are right.
173:
May your hand help me,
\q for I have chosen your instructions.
\q
174:
I long for your rescue, Yahweh,
\q and your law is my delight.
175:
May I live and praise you,
\q and may your righteous decrees help me.
\q
